resources:
Bisq Pair Send token to myself Next Learn more Show notifications OK Settings About Reset and pair againxc Show notifications No Webcam? No Webcam? Congratulations, you are all set.
    
Bisq is an open-source desktop application that allows you to buy and sell bitcoins in exchange for national currencies, or alternative crypto currencies. Do you want to use your computer's webcam or do you want to send an email to yourself? Now you can receive notifications about your Bisq trades. Pair your phone with Bisq Please open the Bisq desktop app on your computer and go to Account -> Notifications. Then copy this Pairing token into the field "Pairing token":

 

The pairing token contains your excryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by Bisq to encrypt the notifications for you and a token from Google that identifies this app. Bisq notifications Send the email to yourself.

Then go to your computer and open the Bisq App.

Open Account -> Notifications

Then open the email and paste the Pairing token into Bisq.

Your phone will automatically receive a confirmation notification. Go to your computer and open the Bisq App.

Open Account -> Notifications

Then press "Scan QR code".

Your phone will automatically receive a confirmation notification. Congratulations, you are all set. instructions Resend email Bisq_notification_channel bisq_broadcast
